website_summaries.verdict: With fast and easy installation, you can easily convert a regular ceiling fan into a remote control one.
pros: Comes with holster that can be easily mounted to the wall
Can operate at distances of up to 100 feet

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars for doing what it said and great price, but the receiver BEEP's every time the ...
customer_reviews.text: The receiver BEEPS! with every transmitter button push. 5 Stars for doing what it said and great price, but the receiver BEEP's every time the transmitter button is pushed, kinda annoying. On the one hand its good to know that the Rx got the signal but would prefer to know that the Rx BEEPs in the description.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Woodrough

customer_reviews.title: It beeps and works
customer_reviews.text: I installed it on a regular fan with light. Wiring was straightforward. Wires are clearly marked with tapes. I like the unique match between the remote and receiver because it avoids conflicting with my other Hampton Bay fans that use dip settings. It is a little thicker than the Hampton Bay receiver, so it may pose a problem if the cover around the motor is small. I taped the receiver on the ceiling as mine has plenty of space in the cover. As other reviews pointed out, the receiver beeps when you click the remote. It might bother some people but I do not mind the sound as it is installed in a basement room, away from other bedrooms upstairs.
customer_reviews.author: garunner

customer_reviews.title: Enough space in canopy?
customer_reviews.text: As the seller notes in the description, you need to know if the receiver will fit into the ceiling canopy. That's important if you are concerned with appearance, however I'm not. I only wanted convenience. None of the ceiling fans in my house have a big enough ceiling canopy to house the receiver, so I cut a notch in the canopy big enough to allow the wires to exit the canopy and taped the receiver to the down rod. I really like the fact that you can set the timer for 1, 2, 4, or 8 hours. I hove only used the 1 hour timer so far and it works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: DACK01

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR BEDROOMS - THE BEEP CAN BE HEARD THROUGHOUT THE HOME
customer_reviews.text: Pros: attractive remote with rubber buttons, audible beep lets you know the button command was received, inexpensive. Cons: Thicker receiver than competitors, no dimming feature, uses 23A battery, doesn't come with wire nuts, doesn't come with mounting screws for the remote holder. Beep - It's brief but loud - like a chirping smoke alarm with a bad battery Battery - readily available, but not in your battery stash Mounting screws - Takes 2 screws with a small head to mount the remote holder (off to the hardware store) Connectors included - Never seen them before. Not taking a chance on them. Switching to wire nuts.
customer_reviews.author: Chris MacLaurin

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, works well
customer_reviews.text: Had an electrician install the remote to our ceiling fan. Didn't take too long but we realized our fan could only be used in one direction now. Not an issue for us but just check that if you want to change from down (summer) to up for (winter) heat circulation. The beep is a bit annoying when you turn it on but if you set the timer, it is silent when it turns off. Also, we noticed, when we loose power and it comes back on, the light on our fan comes on too. Maybe just our unit but it was interesting. Easy to use, works well enough.
customer_reviews.author: C-L

customer_reviews.title: Great after market remote for your fan!
customer_reviews.text: Great remotes. Pretty intuitive and easy to install. Works very well. It looks pretty sleek and blends in with the switches in the rooms. I like the timer function on the remotes. I was also able to use the light on/off function by putting in a light kit for the fans. I wish they would have included the screws and wall jacks for securing the remote to the wall. Perhaps make the fan unit a bit smaller since it is always a tight fit getting it into the fan.
customer_reviews.author: VR

customer_reviews.title: Work perfectly BUT
customer_reviews.text: The BUT is the fact that it doesn't fit in the dome on top of the fan. I have a model that is listed but my dome(located on the fan itself) is way to small for the remote to fit in it....I am using it and hope to paint it white to fade into the ceiling so it isn't as noticeable. Other than that big fact - it works as written and is very easy to install except the size factor. I can live with it but I know others should be advised about the size factor!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph S. Wolfson Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Hard to fit in my fan cover but worth the struggle
customer_reviews.text: Make sure to measure and see if this will fit. I had to attempt several times as the wires kept disconnecting when I tried to get the cover back on. I got frustrated and my boyfriend finally got it on with all wires staying connected. Once it was actually in there it has worked fabulously and I love being able to turn the lights off from my bed. It helps to be able to turn them back on in the morning as well as I am not a morning person.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and working well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace an existing Hampton Bay remote set that I couldn't get to work upon moving into a new place, I tried everything I could find. I gave up and just bought this set instead. Installing it couldn't be easier, it fit into place just the same as what I was replacing. I like that the unit beeps to let you know the remote signal was received. So far, so good, I recommend. I would install this on other fans if I needed to.
customer_reviews.author: Ruprecht

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: I want this to use as an alternative from always using the light switch on the wall. This device act as a movable light switch As I placed the remote on the wall closer to the bed for easier access. Although the device was big and bulky and made the install much harder, The function of the device works very well. If you have limited space or a small area underneath the fan housing this device may not be for you. I shoved it under the ceiling and rigged it that it would distract the installation of the fan. However, this took a lot of effort and probably isn't ideal.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Ricci

customer_reviews.title: They don’t even know what they’re selling
customer_reviews.text: Like every other fan remote I’ve used I expected to be able to use my wall switch to turn the lights/fans on or off when I left the room. Seller even said in the Q&A section that the lights will turn back on when the switch is turned on, this is absolutely untrue. You have to use the remote to turn the lights back on, once the switch is turned off the unit resets back to everything off.
customer_reviews.author: Chris G.

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Just installed, so I don't know about longevity, thus 4 stars. Does everything I needed at the best price. If you have a small canopy that no remote receiver will fit in and you can't access area above ceiling, do what I did. Fan had no light, so I added a school house globe style light kit and put the receiver inside the globe along side of the bulb (CFL). Receiver case easily removed to reduce footprint. If you do this, use a CFL or tubular LED for space and heat considerations. Don't try this if you do not have a decent amount of wiring skill.
customer_reviews.author: george s sproesser

customer_reviews.title: Directions are sparce
customer_reviews.text: That this remote would also fun the lights but does not. Emailed the company asking if they had a light dimming remote and the reply was that this model does not. Well I knew that! Also there is no reference to the Timer in the directions and also asked that in my email but it was not answered. Keeping the remote since I paid an electrician to install but not what I expected. Should have read description more thoroughly.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... for the price I just threw it away my bad for going cheap
customer_reviews.text: I hooked it up to my new ceiling fan and it didn’t work the fan and lights worked but not trough remote unfortunately for the price I just threw it away my bad for going cheap
customer_reviews.author: Rick C

customer_reviews.title: Could NOT get it to work with two remotes despite what the page says
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing. I bought two of these solely because I wanted a receiver that would work with two remotes. This product clearly stated that it had that functionality. It did not work and believe me, I read every word not the product detail page and literally tried going through the instructions 20 times. I tried other combinations of things I found on other similar products that had instructions. Overall, this is a low quality product with no help for the customer (i.e. basically no instructions). I will be returning the product since it does not have the functionality it says it does.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Didn't fit fan housing
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if fan housing was small or remote receiver too big. I had to "MODIFY" the fan mount to get the module to slip into the holder. Seemed larger than ones I have previously installed, if only by a very small amount. As far as programming and function it is 5 stars. Very easy. Instructions were a little lacking and English was dodgy at best, but not difficult to figure out.
customer_reviews.author: JZ

customer_reviews.title: Not as Good As Others
customer_reviews.text: One of the things they don't state is that there is a loud beep when you make any changes with the remote. Also, the last one I had I could turn the fan/light on and off by the switch as long as the remote last had the units on. This unit doesn't allow that, so I would have to mount the remote by the door and then take it to the bed for use later.
customer_reviews.author: Gossamer53

customer_reviews.title: SO EASY TO INSTALL AND NO PROGRAMMING JUST PLUG AND USE CONTROLLER
customer_reviews.text: A BREEZE TO INSTALL, AND NO PROGRAMMING. LOVE IT. WAS ABLE TO USE ON MY HARBOR BREEZE MAZON FANS. update 2 i purchased 3 more and no issues. they do not interfere with each other or anything of that nature. the controllers are awesome, include batteries and have light when you clock keys. requires no special programming just plug and play and they are a very nice white. feel very smooth and sleek in hand. so happy with this brand
customer_reviews.author: Tito

customer_reviews.title: Great remote control
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Got it in 1 day. Easy to hook up to my new fan. My fan has the large flush mount base. If you had a regular base I don't think the receiver would fit in it. The remote works great but it does have a loud beep with every button press. My dog doesn't like that but there's not a lot of button pressing so it should be okay. Was much cheaper than big box store products. Definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Tarzan

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: Came quickly and installed very easily. I’m not a handyman by any means and I had it in the fan and working in about 5-10 minutes. The remote is responsive and has the right number of controls for my fan (which is itself a 3 speed fan). As other reviewers mentioned it does emit a loud-ish beep when pressing buttons, but this doesn’t bother me much.
customer_reviews.author: rayshoots

customer_reviews.title: The controller was super easy to install and thank goodness the installation was ...
customer_reviews.text: The controller was super easy to install and thank goodness the installation was fairly intuitive because the directions provided were a little sparse to say the least. One issue to note is that I originally installed the fan on a pre-existing dimmer wall switch circuit. However, the Fnado F2-U controller did not power on even when I dialed the dimmer switch voltage as high as it would go. I eventually replaced my dimmer wall switch with a standard light switch and enough voltage was available to power the controller (receiver) and it works fine. I love the convenience of wireless control and the added bonus of having the system on an optional 1-, 2-, 4- or 8-hour automatic timer!
customer_reviews.author: M Masters

customer_reviews.title: Works great, half the price of other vendors
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. Works great for retro fitting a fan into standard overhead lighting electrical (just need hot, neutral, and ground coming in). Did not fit in the top portion of the fan so I had to hide it in the ceiling (had to remove the junction box anyway). All the receivers I looked at seemed huge. Not sure how anyone gets them in a downpost-style ceiling fan without hiding it in the ceiling.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: It functions
customer_reviews.text: I wish it didn't beep every time you switch it on and the black receiver wouldn't fit in my ceiling fan, but it replaced the original one that broke and functions. I'm gonna try modifying something to get it to fit under the cover, but until than I hardly notice the small black box next to the base of my fan. It is a great cheap alternative to some similar products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Died after 15 minutes of initial use
customer_reviews.text: Was hopeful for this product, as it seems it tough to find an inflator at a decent price that can keep car tires inflated at proper air pressure. Used this product for about 15 minutes getting a couple of tires topped off and up to pressure, and when I went to inflate the third tie, the unit just quit. Wouldn't power on, nothing. Sorry, but I cannot recommend such a product.
customer_reviews.author: H. C. Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Have a fan that's power comes from a different part of the house and running a switch was not an option this thing worked like a charm. Had to drill a couple new holes in the base of the fan mount to run the wires and the wires on the unit are fairly short. Once it is hooked up works great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the timer feature in the remote
customer_reviews.text: Had 3 of these installed on fans where it was difficult to adjust sports. Love the timer on the remote. My only complaint is that the light switch no longer turns anything on but will still turn it off. But totally worth the trade off! Able to fall asleep with my ceiling fan in using the timer!
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 and installed them on 3 different manufactures of fans. All work perfectly. In fact the response time is instant. I'm really happy with these except for one item. The battery is one of those wierd off size batteries that are very expensive. So you won't be buying a pack of cheap batteries for your controllers.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical about this at first. I wasn’t sure it would even work. I installed it for my father in law who is disabled and I wanted to give him the ability to turn the fan / light on without help. I installed it fairly easily, the only issue I had was placement of the receiver. I ended up zip tying it to the anchor of the fan. I’m extremely happy with this solution and it works great!!
customer_reviews.author: LKWJeeper

customer_reviews.title: It’s a good one!
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality. The wiring was easy, all the wires were labeled, wiring schematic was printed on the back and in the instructions. Good weight for both the receiver and transmitter. I liked the beep when you use the transmitter too.
customer_reviews.author: McGuivr

customer_reviews.title: Almost good.
customer_reviews.text: Product was ALMOST what I wanted. Wireless control works well. My issue is when you turn the light off via switch, it won't turn back on unless you use the remote. If you leave the remote on your nightstand and then turn the light off as you leave the room, the light won't turn back on unless you turn the switch on AND turn the light back on with the remote.
customer_reviews.author: G&C Churchill

customer_reviews.title: nice and easy way to add a fan control
customer_reviews.text: My fans were direct wired and I got sick of constanly replacing pull chains and never having them off in bedrooms. These were fairly easy to install, I love the timers, the only thing I don't like is the annoying beep they make when setting... drives my dog nuts for some reason.
customer_reviews.author: Dannie M.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install at good price.
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with my purchase. Easy to install, and affordable. The best thing about this product is that I can set the time (2,4,6,8 hour). It is very difficult or expensive to find a remote equipped timer. The receiver was a little thicker than other brand, but I was able to install it, luckly, there was plenty of room in my ceiling fan. Most of all, it's only $17.
customer_reviews.author: D.H. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Does what it suppose to do.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. It beeps when you push a button on the remote. It was shocking at first, but it’s nice to actually here when the daughter is messing with the remote or know that when I push the button, it actually registered the command. Going strong months after purchase. Like it better than the ones from the big box stores in the other rooms.
customer_reviews.author: Wannabedyi

customer_reviews.title: Very Convenient/Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm. Installation was easy. My fans are installed on a covered patio, it’s convenient to control the fans from other areas of my house and yard. This wireless control is the perfect addition to operating the fans from a distance. I’m very happy with the remote control performance with my two new fans.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Pibbbi

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to install. Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Very simple and easy to install. Remember though, take the little piece of plastic out that sits in the battery compartment. I couldn't get my remote control to work and duh, I didn't check that. Pulled the plastic out and everything worked.
customer_reviews.author: Zicc

customer_reviews.title: Not satisifed
customer_reviews.text: I had to return the fan control because the instructions did not match the unit. The instructions appeared to be written by a person without a clear understanding of the English language. Would not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Charlie S

customer_reviews.title: Don’t think, just BUY it.
customer_reviews.text: So so so simple to install anyone can do it I promise. Just becaful and make sure to turn off power. It took me literally 3 min to wire up. (Mine came with a thing to cennect the wires so you pretty much just need a screwdriver to open the base of the fan) and yeah makes the room “feel” nicer not just that haveing the 3 speeds on a remote is awesome. No complaints and it’s a really grate price.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Z.

customer_reviews.title: Works with Bond and Alexa if you set up manually and update Bond firmware.
customer_reviews.text: When I first installed the controller, it wouldn't connect to my Bond Automation bridge, hence, I couldn't control it with Alexa. After upgrading the Bond firmware to V2.10.8, I was able to manually set up the light and three fan speeds. The controller the Bond app first suggested didn't work. So the key is update firmware and set up each button manually. Hopefully a future Bond firmware update will recognize Fnado controllers.
customer_reviews.author: Bart Heightema

customer_reviews.title: Works great but beeps when used.
customer_reviews.text: Installed with little difficulty. Works as intended. But knocked off a star for that beeping noise that occurs every time a button is pressed. Its not so far as annoying and I can see where it could be useful but it was unexpected and at the time of purchase was not mentioned in the ad.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Works well so far.
customer_reviews.text: Although it is a tight fit in a hugger type fan, the actual installation is straight forward. I later found the seller to suggest removing the case in tight fit situation. I would rate 5 stars if I could silence the confirmation beep.
customer_reviews.author: mwells2000

customer_reviews.title: Very good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install considering we already had a similar receiver in the ceiling. The only difference is that this remote doesn’t have dimming function (which I don’t really need anyway). Have not tried the timer function.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Need operation instructions
customer_reviews.text: Works but it came with no instructions on use. My electrician installed mine as part of the job. I don’t think it’s hard to install but I don’t know what all it does because, like I said, no instructions. There are 2 cirlcles. The top one clearly turns on/ off the light and fan and sets the fan speed. The bottom one has numbers but not sure what they mean. I’m guessing timers but they did nothing when I pressed them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Work good. Paid $11
customer_reviews.text: Everything work good. No dimmer feature is the reason for 4 stars. I like the beeps. The beep sound is a feedback of your settings. Price paid $11 on 15 Augb2020. Good price Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Joemanny

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I used as a replacement for a faulty unit in a hunter ceiling fan. Works great. Has been working longer than the original unit. Easy swap. This one has a timer function that my original one did not have.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: PRICE AND FEATURES
customer_reviews.text: Greetings and first of all thanks for a product that really work as described, all my fans are HUNTER brand the canopy is the perfect size, but Hunter remote control are too costly. Fnado F2-U has all necessary features timer, three speeds and light control. Fit neatly on the wall next to my room light switch, did i mention I bought four (4) units? Anyway they work fine but my four fans are without light fixtures so no light, can't win them all.
customer_reviews.author: geddesames

customer_reviews.title: Works as it should
customer_reviews.text: Works as described. It has an audible beep at the fan when you push a button on the remote, which I like because you know the fan got the message. The only thing I would like to have is a dimmer for the lighting. Overall pleased with this remote and definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your time and money.
customer_reviews.text: Twice the size of a normal one that comes with most fans, doesn’t fit in the housing at all. Messed my ceilings up trying to wrestle with it. Finally got it in but couldn’t get the cover over it due to space for the wires... they don’t give you caps, they give you these horrible clips that don’t work. And once I had it connected the speed of the fan was no where what it was. Slow was barely moving, medium was less than slow and fast was a brisk pace. Horrible product and it is being returned.
customer_reviews.author: Zdtart88

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as Described - Good Stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love this wireless remote system. The remote buttons are kinda firm and you can feel it be pressed down. The beep function can be turned on or off. I'm pleased with the device and would recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: T. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: All around great item
customer_reviews.text: Fit my fan perfectly and is easy to install for anyone who has installed a fan or light switch before (especially since they included quick-connectors instead of wire nuts). Works great and the remote has nice sturdy feel to it it. Honestly, I like it better than the Hunter remote I have in another room.
customer_reviews.author: CA

customer_reviews.title: Tight, Tight, Tight Fit
customer_reviews.text: But once installed, works great. Easily works from 50' away, which is my max distance. Being able to dim the light would be nice, but not a big deal on the patio. Bought 2 for matching fans. Would be nice to be able to control both with 1 remote. But overall, 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: Rich C

customer_reviews.title: If I purchase something, I expect it to be of high quaility and will operate correctly for many years.
customer_reviews.text: Received the item in good order, installed it in the fan, working OK. Hope it continues to work OK for quite a while. The last one only lasted less than five years (it was not of this brand).
customer_reviews.author: BlueMax

customer_reviews.title: Would not fit in fan canopy
customer_reviews.text: The housing for the electronics was too large to fit inside my Hunter ceiling fan canopy. Very large, not even close. If it had fit there would be no room for the wire connectors.
customer_reviews.author: Ridgeland MS

customer_reviews.title: It works great BUT
customer_reviews.text: The receiver is very large and difficult to install, you really have to fiddle and stuff into the housing. That said, once you finally force it in the housing the remote works very well, quite responsive and long range
customer_reviews.author: Ben Cabell

customer_reviews.title: Low cost solution for wireless control of fan.
customer_reviews.text: We needed a wireless remote for a ceiling fan installed in a very tall home entryway. This remote was both reasonably priced and easy to install and use. The main computer brain is hidden in the light shield at the ceiling. The control can be mounted in a plastic holder on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 1 light switch converted
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I only had 1 switch that controlled the fan and the light. With this I was able to control both individually. Control box is big. I had to modify my base to make it work. Still not to hard to install.
customer_reviews.author: jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Reset unit
customer_reviews.text: Had remote for 16 months everything was fine. Went away on vacation came home and it didn't work. Turned power off at circuit breaker checked connections everything was fine. whens I flipped the breaker to restore power I heard the beep. Went inside and everything was working. So if yours fails try resetting by flipping breaker on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Golden Knight 87

customer_reviews.title: installation was easy. I used some Command strips to attach it ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well, installation was easy. I used some Command strips to attach it to the ceiling inside the canopy and that worked great. I wish it came with some wire connectors, that would have made it easier and saved me a trip to the store. Remote is good but I wish it did not beep everytime you pushed a button. I can hear when they turn the light or fan on from the other room. I am worried that is going to get super annoying but we will give it some time and see how it goes.
customer_reviews.author: R. Hepperle

customer_reviews.title: It beeps loudly and resets after you toggle the light switch
customer_reviews.text: This basically has to become your light switch because if you turn off the switch and turn it back on it just beeps and doesn't turn the light or fan on - it doesn't remember the state you had it in when you turned the switch off, a minimally basic function.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Harlow

customer_reviews.title: Great for non-dimable LED retro-fit.
customer_reviews.text: I installed this because the LED replacements for mini-candelabra bulbs in my cieling fan are not dimable and this has just an on/off switch for the lights. Works like a charm. This was the only remote fan switch I could find without a light dimmer - and just the on/off switch.
customer_reviews.author: SJ

customer_reviews.title: Bought one to try and ended up buying more!
customer_reviews.text: Love these, easy to work with, work as directed. Highly recommend! I bought one to try and ended up buying more bc it worked so well and the others works just as well.
customer_reviews.author: JMR

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit inside on my 5 series Hunter. Soft beep at button press does not bother me as it does others. My 18" remote house fan makes the same beep. Very easy to install. The remote wall cradle is an added bonus. Happy and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: J. J. Mason

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised..
customer_reviews.text: We bought this, along with a fan, and had them installed a couple of days ago. They both work great! The remote is nice, as it includes a timer. We can run the fan for 1, 2, 4, or 8 hours, which is so convenient.
customer_reviews.author: waynegr69

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Was a tight fit to get into our hunter fan but my husband was able to make it work. Really wonderful to be able to turn off the light without having to use the pull chain. The beeps haven’t annoyed me yet but we shall after some time
customer_reviews.author: vesper967

customer_reviews.title: Large receiver
customer_reviews.text: Maybe this remote works well, it did not fit under my Hunter fan ceiling canopy so I never had a chance to use it.
customer_reviews.author: David B. Albrecht

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect...Found the perfect ceiling fan, but was not remote controlled. This works perfect and easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect FANTASTIC
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly. Bout this to use withand they seemed to be made for each other.
customer_reviews.author: itzKat

customer_reviews.title: They work great! They were installed easily by my contractor
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these because I was mounting ceiling fans in rooms hat didn’t previous have anything. It was more expensive to wire new light switches in, so I decided to try these instead. They work great! They were installed easily by my contractor. My only regret is that they are not dimmable.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Parke

customer_reviews.title: Working well
customer_reviews.text: Easy installation, worked well. I like the timer capability, not present in the fixed wall fan remote switches. I hope it lasts long. The only issue is that it is lacking screws for the remote holder !!!
customer_reviews.author: Johnson Keiriz

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy - poor quality and annoying beeps
customer_reviews.text: Worked for awhile, and then failed. Click to turn on light and it just flashes on and off. Suspect quality. Annoying beeping sound. Not much to like. Buy a brand name solution and save yourself some headaches.
customer_reviews.author: JTS

customer_reviews.title: worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I have only installed one remote in the bedroom, for my handicapped wife. A welcome convenience.
customer_reviews.author: old shakey

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Easy installation ... Good directions ... Functions well ... Overall size a little too big - extremely tight fit in Fan Housing.
customer_reviews.author: S. D. S.

customer_reviews.title: Ease of installation
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, clear instructions & works as advertised. Reasonable price, I recommend it if you need the convenience of a remote for an existing fan.....for the fraction of the cost of a fan with remote.
customer_reviews.author: Samir B.

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement unit set
customer_reviews.text: Item replaced a receiver from a Menards Turn of the Century ceiling fan. Replacing was easy. Liked the quick connection for receiver to fan but still used wire nuts on the larger supply side wires. Missed not having dimmer functions and could do without the beeps. Haven’t used the timer function. Maybe come summer. This went into an upstairs bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: added to my ceiling fan that I can't reach due to hi ceilings and now we are spoiled. Works great all the time.TY
customer_reviews.author: D. Ammons

customer_reviews.title: Great deal, great product
customer_reviews.text: SO happy with this item. Priced much lower than similar controllers at Lowe's. Handpiece is stylish and well laid out. Love the delay feature (you can set auto-off to 4 different time settings)
customer_reviews.author: Alex Denes

customer_reviews.title: Saves on Electricity
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the timing function, as it saves us money on electricity. It was very easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Greg S

customer_reviews.title: Simple installattion and set up.
customer_reviews.text: Followed instructions and installed easily. Nothing to dislike about installation or operation. Works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Asplund

customer_reviews.title: A remote for ceiling fans that don't come with remotes
customer_reviews.text: I didn't even know this type of thing existed until my handyman told me to get one for my non-remote fan. The fan was placed in a newly built, 16' high ceiling screen house, so there was no way we were getting up there to turn it on and off. Works like a golden charm.
customer_reviews.author: Posh Gypsy

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: works just fine it does have some beeping when you push the buttons and the module that goes in the fan is a little larger than the one that I replaced but otherwise it's just as easy to replace as the original and it works just fine for the price it's great I've had it for about 2 months
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Works for Hunter fan and is nice looking, as well as sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Good alternative to paying high price Hunter was charging just to replace a remote transmitter. We took out the old receiver replacing with FNADO new universal one. It is nice looking and complements the Hunter fan. Installation was as stated with only minimal instructions, fairly easy.
customer_reviews.author: Jazzy Jaz

customer_reviews.title: It’s pretty much universal
customer_reviews.text: Great price,made my fan work again.My celing fan was going Wacko turning on by itself,lights flickering and making arcing sounds.I was ready to scrap the whole thing when I saw this product. I figured a 20.00 dollar gamble was worth a try. I was very pleased with the results the fan runs like new.
customer_reviews.author: archie konschnik

customer_reviews.title: Was a tight fit
customer_reviews.text: Was a tight fit , get the updated model it is smaller easier to fit in small place
customer_reviews.author: Brian H.

customer_reviews.title: Too Big
customer_reviews.text: I am sure this item would have worked fine however, I had to return it as the transformer was too big to fit in the fan. I purchased another one that was smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Brabo

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement for my old remote
customer_reviews.text: You can't beat the price or the quality. Fast delivery. Just wish it would dim my light like my old one. But that direct replacement was $35 more. Very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: TL

customer_reviews.title: Beeps every-time you press a button
customer_reviews.text: The install was ok, the direction were awful, and it doesn't keep the light on if you turn the switch off. Every time you press a button to turn the fan up or down or the light on or off it has a LOUD beep.
customer_reviews.author: TMO

customer_reviews.title: Excellent remote easy install
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased and installed 6 of these fan remotes.They work very well and I will purchase about 3 more to complete all the fans in our home.Excellect product.
customer_reviews.author: Lozzie1

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Makes an annoying beep anytime you change settings. Haven’t figured out how to use the timer. Instructions are awful. The hookup is easy just match wire colors!
customer_reviews.author: lovespictures

customer_reviews.title: Works...easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Works fine easy to install....love the timer feature. Only annoying thing is the beeper when making a change. 3/9/19 will update if it fails or misbehaves.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great, works as described
customer_reviews.text: Works great with our ceiling fan! We bought a ceiling fan from Home Depot, but it did not come with a remote. Our ceiling fan is not wired to an outlet, therefore it was important for us to have a hand-held remote. So far, the remote works seemelssly.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly A. Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price
customer_reviews.text: The only complaint that I have is the instructions were not very clear. It was easy for me to install but I have been in the electronics business for 30 years. Someone with limited experience may have some problems. Product works well and I am extremely happy. Good quality and price.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Burgess

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect. Easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Was easy to install and works perfect. Only drawback is the light is only on/off. Thought the light was dimmable. Also make sure you have enough room for the receiver in your fan.
customer_reviews.author: poconovacation

customer_reviews.title: Works fine, but no directions on the timer.
customer_reviews.text: It fit well in the space, and the fan and light controls are great. Since there were no control directions, have no idea how to set the timer.
customer_reviews.author: Manwe1

customer_reviews.title: Too big receiver
customer_reviews.text: The receiver is too big to fit in the ceiling fan box on vaulted ceiling .
customer_reviews.author: Ivo T.

customer_reviews.title: works great in a small base fan!
customer_reviews.text: I was really happy that this fit into a fan with a small base. Have to get the wires pushed in just right, but it works where other units in the past would have not have fit insde the base. Works great! Now I'll buy 2 more for my other fans!
customer_reviews.author: Aaronosaurus

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this!
customer_reviews.text: It was more work to assemble the receiver in the fan, because it never worked, do not waste your time and buy a quality brand, cheap in the end is more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: RonnyS21

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient and easy to install/use
customer_reviews.text: It would be helpful if it came with TWO remotes, one to leave by the door/light switch and one for by the bed. Other than that, this is great and we love it.
customer_reviews.author: K. Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Great if you don't want accurate customer support from China.
customer_reviews.text: Unit works very well (*****). I needed a second remote. I wrote to customer service in China (*). They gave me inaccurate instructions and finally did not answer my emails. It is your call. Do you want a good product or good customer service? YOU CAN'T HAVE BOTH!
customer_reviews.author: BCJ

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: Best delivery but too large to fit in ceiling cover. Cannot evaluate performance.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: kills some of the fan speed
customer_reviews.text: kills some of the fan speed and hums on high
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works like described and a good buy
customer_reviews.text: This works as expected. This is the second one I buy for a different installation and no problems
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Fnado F2-U [Learning Code] 3-in-1 Universal Ceiling Fan Lamp Remote Controller Kit & Timing Wireless Remote Control For Hunter/Harbor Breeze/Westinghouse/Honeywell/Other Ceiling Fan
feature_bullets: √ [ Update Version ] - Higher Quality, More Stable, 1 Year Replacement Warranty. Fit Most Ceiling Fan Lamp.
√ [ Easy and Fast ] - Installation is very easy and fast, It is a nice looking remote and with rubber textured buttons that are easy to press and it comes with a holster you can mount to the wall.

√ [ Multi-Functions ] - Includes separate buttons for 3 fan speeds,designed to separately control your ceiling fan speed and light ; Includes wall cradle for handheld remote control,This kit converts regular ceiling fan into a remote controllable one.
√ [Long Operate distance]- up to 30Meters(100-feet)in open air.Works with down rod mounted fans; receiver mounts in fan canopy.

√ [ 1 Year Replacement Warranty ] - Our Total Customer Satisfaction Guarantee - Thank you for making us the Fnado ceiling fan remote control. If you are not 100% completely satisfied, simply contact us to request a refund or exchange ! CE / ROHS Certification!
